data.title: Issue June 17, 2024
data.meta_description: Buy People, June 17, 2024 on our Newsstand or get the subscription to the digital magazine and read it anywhere, anytime.
data.text:
‘So sad for him that he made such a great mistake that he has to live with’—SHANIA TWAIN, on her ex-husband Robert John “Mutt” Lange having an affair, on the Great Company With Jaime Laing podcast‘He taught me that age is just a number. It’s a f---ing big number, but it’s a number!’—KRIS JENNER, on her 25-year age gap with boyfriend Corey Gamble, on The Kardashians‘Thank you for choosing me as your Daddy and helping me create some of the best memories of a LIFETIME’—LUDACRIS, wishing his daughter Cadence a happy 9th birthday, on Instagram‘I always loved what I was doing. If it had felt like work, I probably would have stopped it a long time ago’—DICK VAN DYKE, on his long career, to Deadline‘Leave your mark. Let them know…

1 Lisa Marie Presley’s Memoir The late singer’s actress daughter Riley Keough (left, with Lisa Marie in 2012) cowrote a book based on her mom’s writings and tapes. She revealed the cover: From Here to the Great Unknown features Lisa Marie with her dad, Elvis. 2 Home Alone house on sale Keep the change, ya filthy animal! The Chicago residence known for appearing as the McCallister family home in the Christmas classic Home Alone is for sale at $5.25 million. 3 Deadpool & Wolverine’s popcorn bucket In the wake of Dune: Part Two’s viral theater popcorn bucket, Ryan Reynolds posted a cheeky video unveiling a bucket with a lid featuring Hugh Jackman’s Wolverine mask. 4 Chris Martin’s Rideshare Service The Coldplay frontman leaves no fan behind. He gave a lift to Saundra Glenn, 64, who was having…

FLYING HIGH! Fort Worth, June 2 Simone Biles nabbed a record ninth U.S. Gymnastics Championships title, bringing her one step closer to securing a spot at the Paris 2024 Summer Olympic Games in July. “I use the phrase ‘Aging like fine wine,’” Biles, 27, said after the competition. The seven-time Olympic medalist and most decorated gymnast of all time had fans cheering her on in the stands at Dickies Arena, including husband Jonathan Owens and her younger sister Adria. BOY BANDERS UNITED Niagara Falls, Ont., May 30 Backstreet Boy AJ McLean (left) and *NSYNC’s Joey Fatone were tearin’ up the stage during a stop on their A Legendary Night tour. DOG DAYS OF SUMMER Los Angeles, May 30 Simu Liu didn’t need his shirt for a walk with pup Chopa, who served as the actor’s plus-one at press events…

When Jennifer Lopez and Ben Affleck stepped out together in Santa Monica to attend his 12-year-old son Sam’s basketball game on June 2, things appeared to be cordial between them. Affleck, 51, wore his wedding ring, and he and Lopez, 54, shared a kiss on the cheek as they greeted each other outside the event venue. But beneath the surface, things remained tense. Just two days earlier, amid reports of strain in their marriage, Lopez canceled her This Is Me … Live tour less than four weeks before it was set to begin, with Live Nation citing her need to “be with her children, family and close friends” in a statement. In a message shared to her OntheJLo website, the singer explained her reasoning further. “I am completely heartsick and devastated…

Angelina Jolie and Brad Pitt’s daughter Shiloh made a big move on her 18th birthday on May 27: She filed court documents to drop Pitt from her last name and requested her new legal name to be Shiloh Jolie. “Shiloh hired her own lawyer and paid for it herself,” says a source close to the matter, pointing to Jolie’s allegations of Pitt’s “abuse history” as part of the reason. Shiloh’s siblings Vivienne, 15, and Zahara, 19, previously stopped using Pitt in their last name. (Jolie, 49, and Pitt, 60, also share Knox, 15, Pax, 20, and Maddox, 22.) As for Pitt, “he’s aware and upset that Shiloh dropped his last name,” says a friend of the actor’s. ANDREA STACCIOLI/INSIDEFOTO/MONDADORI PORTFOLIO/GETTY IMAGES; MONICA SCHIPPER/GETTY IMAGES; EMMA MCINTYRE/WIREIMAGE…

GOING STRONG Ariana Grande & Ethan Slater The pop star, 30, cheered on her Broadway actor boyfriend, 32, as he kicked off his weeklong residency at Café Carlyle in N.Y.C. on May 28. “She was laughing at all of his jokes in between songs,” a source says of Grande, who met Slater on the set of the upcoming Wicked film. BACK ON Bad Bunny & Kendall Jenner The model, 28, and the music superstar, 30, have rekindled their romance following their December 2023 split. “They missed each other,” says a source. “It’s going well, and they’re prioritizing spending time together as they figure it out.” IT’S OVER Joe Jonas & Stormi Bree On June 1 People confirmed that the Jonas Brothers singer, 34, and the model, 33, had recently ended their relationship. The two were first linked in…
